title: Are Arsenal Title Contenders?
description:
The FC crew preview a massive Sunday in the Premier League as Chelsea host Arsenal and Liverpool travel to face Tottenham. Plus, Alessandro Del Piero joins the show to break down Inter's visit to Juventus, analyze Napoli's chances to win Serie A and give tribute to Gerard Pique's illustrious career.
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit megaphone.fm/adchoices
itunes:author: ESPN
itunes:subtitle: Chelsea host top of the table Arsenal on Sunday; Conte's future with Tottenham; Alessandro Del Piero on Juventus
